items.title: Boeing CEO faces Senate hearing on plane maker's recovery
items.content: Boeing's CEO Kelly Ortberg faces senators' questions about its recovery from a series of manufacturing and safety crises.
items.contentSnippet: Boeing's CEO Kelly Ortberg faces senators' questions about its recovery from a series of manufacturing and safety crises.

items.title: Tequila maker says tariffs won't affect his prices. Here's why he plans to absorb costs
items.content: Colorado-based Suerte Tequila said it will absorb all tariff costs.
items.contentSnippet: Colorado-based Suerte Tequila said it will absorb all tariff costs.

items.title: GM's first-quarter U.S. vehicle sales lead industry as automakers braces for tariffs
items.content: GM reported a 16.7% jump in U.S. sales compared to the first quarter of 2024, led my incremental gains in sales of new EVs and notable gains in full-size SUVs.
items.contentSnippet: GM reported a 16.7% jump in U.S. sales compared to the first quarter of 2024, led my incremental gains in sales of new EVs and notable gains in full-size SUVs.

items.title: Airline stocks slide as concerns grow over consumers' travel appetite

items.title: Shares of conservative cable channel Newsmax soar another 179% after massive debut
items.content: Newsmax shares soared for a second day after their public debut, as the conservative news channel gains traction during President Donald Trump's second term.
items.contentSnippet: Newsmax shares soared for a second day after their public debut, as the conservative news channel gains traction during President Donald Trump's second term.

items.title: Eli Lilly sues two pharmacies making copycat Zepbound, Mounjaro
items.content: Eli Lilly is suing Strive Pharmacy and Empower Pharmacy for compounding tirzepatide, the active ingredient in Zepbound and Mounjaro.
items.contentSnippet: Eli Lilly is suing Strive Pharmacy and Empower Pharmacy for compounding tirzepatide, the active ingredient in Zepbound and Mounjaro.

items.title: Federal funding cuts are raising questions about university endowments. Here's what some are worth and how they work
items.content: Columbia is one of the richest universities with a $14.8 billion endowment. Still, covering federal funding cuts isn't as simple as smashing a piggy bank.

items.title: Vaccine stocks fall after key FDA official resigns in protest of RFK Jr.

items.title: Novo Nordisk's diabetes pill slashes risk of cardiovascular complications by 14% after four years

items.title: FCC says it's investigating Disney and ABC over DEI efforts

items.title: Why GM stock is getting hit the hardest by Trump auto tariffs

items.title: Ferrari says it will raise prices by 10% on some models to offset auto tariffs
